title: Senior Portfolio Manager, Real Estate
preferred_qualifications_text: Bachelor's Degree in Business Management, Real Estate, Project Management, or related field AND 5+ years Portfolio Management, Real Estate, or Office Management experience OR 7+ years equivalent experience. Understand workplace, financial, and organizational dynamics to deliver successful corporate real estate solutions. Communication skills that include presenting information clearly and respond effectively to sensitive issues. Ability to drive solutions and lead effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. A continuous improvement mindset with a passion for optimizing space solutions and driving innovation within the company. Real Estate Portfolio Management IC4 - The
